WorkItem.ClosedComment: See comments. (This behavior is by design. Place the Control in a Viewbox and set the dimensions on the Viewbox.)
WorkItem.Description:
I noticed that the calender control has a fixed width and height.
Why has that code has no effect ?? or how can is set the height and width? (i don't like to write a complete control template for the calender, or have i?)
<c:Calendar Height="500" Width="500"
WorkItem.Summary: Fixed Height and Width of Calender???

Comments.Message:
Hi ThomasG,

We agree that this is a bug. We're filing a bug in our internal database to track this and it will be fixed in a future release.

Thanks,
Samantha

This was actually done by design for various reasons. If you would like the equivilant effect surround the Calendar in a Viewbox and set the Width and Height on the Viewbox.

-Eric, MSFT
